titles.title: A bill to extend and modify the temporary reduction of duty on cyclopropane-1,1-dicarboxylic acid, dimethyl ester.
A bill to extend and modify the temporary reduction of duty on cyclopropane-1,1-dicarboxylic acid, dimethyl ester.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide for the duty-free treatment of a specified chemical.
